column1: A*Oh wow! Is this a visual novel??
A*It sure is! It can display text and character sprites
column2:
and multiple
backgrounds! It can display up to five lines of text per page and an
arbitrary number of pages! I love beingin such a high quality visual
novel!

column1:
A*Yayyy! I've always wanted to be in a visual novel! What is there to
do here?

column2: actually. This visual novel was created for demonstrative\npurposes
column3:
so it has no actual content. You don't get to have an
adventure or a character arc oranything. Your whole purpose is to ask
questions so I can exposit.
that's horrifying! Do I get to show emotions about it?

column1: A*Good question! No. You weren't given any emotion sprites

A*And there's no way out? I'm stuck in this empty visual novel
forever?
A*Not forever! As soon as the dialogue runs out
A*And when will the dialogue run out?
